long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mirror/flip a page if Video/pictures/text are flipped (backwards).  The app rotate the Y-axis 180 degrees. Click on the icon to flip page and reload page to switch back.
The application is free. 

If you would like to donate:
https://paypal.me/appmachinedk?locale.x=da_DK
